text: Irina Vladimirovna Koroleva (neė Zaryazhko) (, born 4 October 1991) is a Russian female volleyball player, who plays as a middle blocker. She is a member of the Women's National Team and has participated at the Universiade (in Kazan 2013, Gwangju 2015), the Montreux Volley Masters (in 2013, 2014, 2015), the Women's European Volleyball Championship (in 2013, 2015), the FIVB Volleyball World Grand Prix (in 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016), the 2014 FIVB Volleyball Women's World Championship in Italy, the 2015 European Games in Baku, and the 2016 Summer Olympics in Rio de Janeiro. At club level, she played for Aouroum Khabarovsk, Samorodok Khabarovsk and Uralochka before joining Dinamo Kazan in 2016. ==Awards== ===Individuals=== * 2013 Montreux Volley Masters "Best Blocker" * 2015 European Championship "Best Middle Blockers" * 2017 Yeltsin Cup "Best Blocker" * 2019 World Cup "Best blocker" ===National team=== ====Junior==== * 2013 Universiade – Image:Med 1.png Gold medal * 2015 Universiade – Image:Med 1.png Gold medal ====Senior==== * 2013 Montreux Volley Masters – Image:Med 2.png Silver medal * 2013 Boris Yeltsin Cup – Image:Med 1.png Gold medal * 2013 European Championship – Image:Med 1.png Gold medal * 2014 Montreux Volley Masters – Image:Med 3.png Bronze medal * 2014 Boris Yeltsin Cup – Image:Med 2.png Silver medal * 2014 FIVB World Grand Prix – Image:Med 3.png Bronze medal * 2015 FIVB World Grand Prix – Image:Med 2.png Silver medal * 2015 European Championship – Image:Med 1.png Gold medal * 2019 World Cup - Image:Med 3.png Bronze medal (with Russia) ===Clubs=== * 2013–14 CEV Cup – Image:Med 2.png Silver medal (with Uralochka) * 2014–15 CEV Women's Challenge Cup – Image:Med 2.png Silver medal (with Uralochka) * 2015–16 Russian Championship – Image:Med 2.png Silver medal (with Uralochka) * 2016 Russian Cup – Image:Med 1.png Gold medal (with Dinamo Kazan) * 2016–17 CEV Cup – Image:Med 1.png Gold medal (with Dinamo Kazan) * 2016–17 Russian Championship – Image:Med 2.png Silver medal (with Dinamo Kazan) ==References== ==External links== *FIVB Profile *Profile at CEV *Profile at Volleyball club Dinamo-Kazan Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Russian women's volleyball players Category:Sportspeople from Novosibirsk Category:European Games competitors for Russia Category:Volleyball players at the 2015 European Games Category:Olympic volleyball players of Russia Category:Volleyball players at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Universiade medalists in volleyball Category:Universiade gold medalists for Russia
title: Irina Koroleva
